amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Public Housing Capital Fund by $110 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce Public Housing Capital Fund by $11,000,000, and apply the savings to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 250 (Roll no. 429).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 250 (Roll no. 429).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
